{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA3500 |upc=745883596782 |asin=B007IL6OR2 |est_release_date=04/04/2012 |fcc_date=02/02/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model=RGWM06 |manuf_rev= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-EA3500 |ic_id=3839A-EA3500 |pcb_id=48RGWM06.SGB |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=SK hynix |fla1_model=H27U518S2CTR-BC |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR-S6C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 8-pin header,, J8,, |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, J7,, (115200,8,N,1),, |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8366 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8063 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip1_model=88W8366 |wi2_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip2_model=88W8063 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6171R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2598L;SiGe, 2598L, 247GF;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2567L;SiGe, 2567L, 315AR;3; ,,, 2A, 2V Non-Synchronous Buck Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS54231;;1; ,,, 4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Three Buck Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS65251;;1; ,,, 4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Buck Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS54325;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.9; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.35.8; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, LEDE Project, |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=20:AA:4B,C8:D7:19 |oui_eth=20:AA:4B,C8:D7:19 }} {{TagLine|Wireless N750 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA3500}} :[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=148482 Firmware and Software Download]
"48RGWM06.SGB" and "Manuf. for CISCO" are silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos. ODM vendor changed to ''[[Wistron NeWeb]]'' instead of ''[[CyberTAN]]''
{{WiFiCert|WFA13839|11/26/2011}} :{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_EA3500}} [[Talk:Linksys_EA3500|About the System-on-Chip Model Number]]
